actions.text: Amendment SA 1103 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 39 - 59. Record Vote Number: 254.

Amendment SA 1103 proposed by Senator Dorgan to Amendment SA 1092. (consideration: CR S8625-8630, S8637; text: CR S8625) To reduce aggregate beneficiary obligations by $2,400,000,000 per year beginning in 2009.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1103 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 39 - 59. Record Vote Number: 254.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1103 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 39 - 59. Record Vote Number: 254.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1103 proposed by Senator Dorgan to Amendment SA 1092.

amends_amendment.purpose: To evaluate alternative payment and delivery systems.

purpose: To reduce aggregate beneficiary obligations by $2,400,000,000 per year beginning in 2009.
